title: Ultimate El Nido Island Hopping
description: Experience the stunning lagoons, hidden beaches, and towering limestone cliffs of Palawan.

title: Boracay Beach & Water Sports Fun
description: Enjoy the famous white-sand beach and try out exciting water activities.

title: Bohol Nature & Culture Explorer
description: See the unique Chocolate Hills, encounter tiny Tarsiers, and cruise the Loboc River.

title: Cebu City & South Adventure
description: Explore the historic sites of the city and head south for canyoneering and snorkeling.

title: Baguio Cool Escapes
description: Relax in the City of Pines. Perfect for family outings and enjoying the cool mountain climate.

title: Manila Heritage Trail
description: A deep dive into the nation's history, exploring Intramuros and historic churches.
